unnormalised: ## Brand Collaborations: Making Magic (and Money!) on Social Media
normalised: ## Brand Collaborations: Making Magic (and Money!) on Social Media

unnormalised: Hey folks! Let's talk brand collaborations. You see it all the time, right? From your favorite beauty guru using a Lakmé Kajal to a travel blogger exploring the backwaters of Kerala with Kerala Tourism. But what's the deal, and how can *you* get in on the action?
normalised: Hey folks! Let's talk brand collaborations. You see it all the time, right? From your favorite beauty guru using a Lakmé Kajal to a travel blogger exploring the backwaters of Kerala with Kerala Tourism. But what's the deal, and how can *you* get in on the action?

unnormalised: Basically, brand collaborations are when a brand teams up with a social media influencer (or another brand, for that matter) to promote their product or service. It's a win-win situation. The brand gets wider reach and credibility, and the influencer gets paid (sometimes in Rs., sometimes in kind – like a free stay at the Taj Mahal Palace!).
normalised: Basically, brand collaborations are when a brand teams up with a social media influencer (or another brand, for that matter) to promote their product or service. It's a win-win situation. The brand gets wider reach and credibility, and the influencer gets paid (sometimes in rupees, sometimes in kind – like a free stay at the Taj Mahal Palace!).

unnormalised: Think about it – Alia Bhatt promoting a new line of clothing on Instagram. Instant buzz! A food blogger reviewing a new biryani place in Hyderabad. Guaranteed hungry customers!
normalised: Think about it – Alia Bhatt promoting a new line of clothing on Instagram. Instant buzz! A food blogger reviewing a new biryani place in Hyderabad. Guaranteed hungry customers!

unnormalised: Why are they so effective? Well, people trust influencers they follow. It feels more like a recommendation from a friend than a blatant advertisement. Plus, influencers often have a niche audience that brands are desperate to tap into. Want to reach college students in Delhi? Partner with a DU influencer! Simple, right?

Plus, influencers often have a niche audience that brands are desperate to tap into. Want to reach college students in Delhi? Partner with a D U influencer! Simple, right?

unnormalised: So how do you land these sweet deals? First, build your brand! Focus on creating awesome content that resonates with your target audience. Be authentic, be engaging, and be consistent. Then, start reaching out to brands you genuinely love and whose values align with yours. Pitch them creative ideas. Don't just send a generic email; personalize it!

Then, start reaching out to brands you genuinely love and whose values align with yours. Pitch them creative ideas. Don't just send a generic email; personalize it!

unnormalised: Remember that time I saw a collab between a dosa restaurant and a saree brand? Unexpected, but totally worked! Don't be afraid to think outside the box.

unnormalised: Keep an eye on your analytics to show brands your impact. Share your success stories. And network! Attend events, connect with other influencers, and build relationships.
normalised: Keep an eye on your analytics to show brands your impact. Share your success stories. And network! Attend events, connect with other influencers, and build relationships.

unnormalised: Pro-tip: always disclose that your post is sponsored. Transparency is key!
normalised: Pro-tip: always disclose that your post is sponsored. Transparency is key!

unnormalised: Also, be mindful of deadlines. If a brand wants a post up by 12/12/2023, you better have it up by 12/12/2023, or you might face a penalty. And make sure your content aligns with their brand guidelines. No promoting alcohol if the brand is all about healthy living, okay?
normalised: Also, be mindful of deadlines. If a brand wants a post up by twelfth december two thousand and twenty three, you better have it up by twelfth december two thousand and twenty three, or you might face a penalty. And make sure your content aligns with their brand guidelines. No promoting alcohol if the brand is all about healthy living, okay?

unnormalised: Finally, remember that building successful collaborations takes time. Don't expect to become a millionaire overnight (unless you win the lottery on 09:00 hrs, 26/01/1950!). Be patient, be persistent, and have fun! After all, you're getting paid to create content you love! Think of that road trip sponsored by Mahindra - from Mumbai to Goa - roughly 600 km - sounds like a dream!
